creditline: Bequest of Charles Phelps and Anna Sinton Taft, Taft Museum of Art, Cincinnati, Ohio
description: milkmaid and seated man and woman front center; cows, dogs, sheep, and goats center and center right; trees in background
text: This painiting is a particularly fine example of Gainsborough's mature style of the 1770s.  That style merged elements of the 17th century Dutch landscape tradition and the more vibrant palette and brush work of the contemporary French Rococo style. The composition is a purely poetic interpretation of rural existence.
title: Wooded Landscape with Milkmaids, Rustic Lover, Herdsman, Cows, Dogs, Sheep, and Goats
